page.title: 18The Edge of the Area
page.content: We walked over the road towards {St. Hilda's church,}then walked over the railway bridge then towards the {Cross Green pub.}We passed a poster: It had Golden Virginia on it. Then we crossed the road to walk on towards the{Green Bridge. We carried on walking past more factories then we turned the corner on to a long row of{metal works}and factories on each side. It was smelly in that area but no one was complaining. In the{brick works}there were square holes missing, for some reason. When we crossed the road, we saw a man who showed us how a clamp was made and put together. In this area it was very busy, with men loading and unloading wagons.
